mapper.select: select plan_fond PLTS_FOND, plan_plan PLTS_PLAN, plan_estact PLTS_ESTA, ptpl_fdei PLTS_FDEI, fdei_tpid PLTS_FDEI_TPID, sysdate PLTS_FCREA, sysdate PLTS_FRECA, ptpl_clas plts_fdei_titu from sf_tplan, sf_tptpl, sf_tfdei where ptpl_plan = plan_plan and ptpl_fond = plan_fond and ptpl_fdei = fdei_fdei and ptpl_tipo = 'T' and ptpl_status = 'A'
